comment: Two ways expressing that ` x ` is effectively not free in ` ph ` . Simplified version of ~ sbnf2 . Note: This theorem shows that ~ sbnf2 has unnecessary distinct variable constraints. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 28-Jul-2019.)
